text: Never had a bad meal here. Tough to understand them over the phone but I guess that's to be expected.
My co-workers and I go to #1 for lunch all the time. The quality is great. The buffet is predictably fantastic. No complaints at all. Check it out.
This used to be our favorite CHINESE RESTAURANT . Wow what a change since it's under new management.Not good at all anymore. Sorry but this the truth....sure miss old management.
Fantastic food fast friendly service. they cut up their own chicken as well, not pre-portioned frozen meat like some restaurants. good fresh food!
This is my family's favorite Chinese fast food restaurant, we eat here at least once a week. The staff is very friendly and helpful. The food is fantastic and very inexpensive for the quality.
